created_idea.title: Integration of Emergency Call System
created_idea.abstract: A mobile phone for elderly and disable people
created_idea.description: A mobile phone for elderly and disabled people should include as a service the option of an emergency call system. This system should be multi-national, i.e. still working when crossing the border to other countries. The phone needs to give feedback to the user, when the phone enters a dead zone (losing connection).

created_idea.title: Underwater kingdom
created_idea.abstract: Fantasy underwater world for children
created_idea.description: The main basis of this idea is maximising the user experience in the shop by building an "underwater kingdom". The kingdom should be experienced like another world by the children. Like if they dive into the world of Arielle, the mermaid. The whole shop should look like an underwater palace built from shells and corals. The children should be able to play with different "objects", like water-plants, mermaid-figures, fish, and other underwater-related toys. The children should be encouraged to use the things in the shop for playing. The goal is to let them stay long in the shop because they like it (to say the user experience is good) - not because they can not decide or need too long to find the right items (which relates to shop architecture and interior). Maybe the children can buy some kind of audio-book to be guided through the underwater world.

created_idea.title: Web-based charity: Turning Actions into Good
created_idea.abstract: Turning Actions into Good is a web-based non-profit charity which revolves around the kindness of strangers
created_idea.description: Turning Actions into Good is a web-based non-profit charity which revolves around the kindness of strangers. The concept allows anyone to participate in a charity, regardless of financial status. Here is how the process works: Become a free member. Print off pre-made TAG-cards. Commit an act of kindness. Give the person a TAG-card which asks the stranger to do another act of kindness and go to the website to report about the deed that was done to them. After submitted, viewers can vote for the most touching act of the month. The leading vote getter would receive a cash prize.

created_idea.title: Fair Trade Organic Coffeehouse sponsoring Social Justice Causes
created_idea.abstract: A completely organic coffeehouse that sponsors social justice causes while taking care with the environment
created_idea.description: I want to create a completely fair trade, completely organic coffeehouse that sponsors social justice causes while taking care with the environment. In addition to serving fair trade coffee, we will also only use fair trade sugar, tea, and cocoa as we educate our consumers on how their buying habits affect the working poor in developing countries. Every month, this coffeehouse would sponsor a social justice cause--promoting awareness to customers about worldwide issues of injustice. This coffeehouse will also have free wifi, live music, local art--all with a community emphasis.

created_idea.title: Earth friendly school supplies and educational website
created_idea.abstract: Educate kids about fundamental eco-friendliness
created_idea.description: Our mission is to educate kids about fundamental eco-friendliness, and encourage them to take action in simple ways. We will provide sustainable alternatives for their everyday use (starting with school supplies) and create a community of young eco-leaders through our website. We ultimately want to give kids the tools to persuade their parents, teachers and friends to get involved as well. Through little acts by little people, we can make a difference.

created_idea.title: The Faces of Autism Website
created_idea.abstract: Parents tell the story of their autistic children
created_idea.description: 1 in 150 Children today has Autism. 1 in 66 Boys today has Autism. Those numbers are staggering, but just what does 1 in 150 look like? Who are the faces behind the numbers?WWW.TheFacesofAutism.com is designed for parents to tell their childs story. Parents will get the opportunity to upload a headshot photo of their child, and fill out basic information about their childs diagnosis,symptoms, treatment plan, etc. This website will give faces to those nameless numbers. TheFacesofAutism.com will make these children impossible to ignore.
